channel.title: [PI] Updating Summoning tab
channel.description: Currently I have the summoning tab added but none of the numbers change on it. For everyone it shows summoning lvl 59/60 and time at 6 minutes, how would I go about making it update these numbers? I have the same problem with the bank size with it showing 134/496 regardless of how many items you have in it.

item.title: [PI] Updating Summoning tab
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

find the string ids for the interfaces and write the variables to the line

Read full topic
